title: Irreversible Token Transfer
description: Token transfer functions without pause mechanism or reversible transactions
remediation: Implement pausable transfers or reversible transaction mechanisms

title: Irreversible Governance Decision
description: Governance decisions cannot be reversed or amended
remediation: Implement timelocks and governance mechanisms that allow reversal

title: Irreversible Upgrade
description: Contract upgrades are irreversible and cannot be rolled back
remediation: Implement upgrade mechanisms with rollback capabilities
